page.title: 01GENERAL FEATURES
page.content: GENERAL FEATURES: The area consists of woodcovered hills with mixed farming in the lowland. The area is a classic example for{ {geologists}and{geomorphologists} with {Devonian} and{Carboniferous} rocks represented. It includes part of the{Forest of Dean}and so incorporates working forest areas. Settlement is scattered with small hamlets. {Dancing Green}is one such hamlet,{Hope Mansell}another. The population is evenly spread. Primary school children go to{Weston-u-Penyard {or to Lea}schools, Secondary pupils to{John Kyrle High School}in Ross-on-Wye. A trucking business operates out of{Hope Mansell}and there is a Soft Drinks Factory in{Bill {Mills.} The {water supply }for {Ross {came from}boreholes in {Coughton {Valley.}(Used for reserve).
